name: 悲惨一日
summary:
What would it be like to live the most violent and accident-filled day imaginable? Through the clever use of P.O.V. color-pencil animation, this short lets you experience the pain without feeling it. Known internationally for the famous "hair on the toast" sequence. 
　　One man's day in suburbia goes from bad to worse to the absolute pits. 
　　Awards: First Prize, USA Film Festival (Dallas, Texas). 
　　First Pr ize, ASIFA San Francisco. 
　　Best Film of Year, ASIFA New York. 
　　Special Animation Award, Zagreb Animation Fest. 
　　Museum of Modern Art, New Directors Series. 
　　Director's Choice Award, Sinking Creek Celebration. 
　　Golden Gate Award, San Francisco Film Festival.
